segments.advisor_message: So, let's start with your first name? Just your first name will do for now.
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, it's Alyssa, but, like, my last name is Jenkins.

segments.advisor_message: Great! And any middle names that I should know about?
segments.client_message: Nah, I don't really have any middle names, just Alyssa Jenkins.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, Alyssa Jenkins. Just checking, do you prefer any pronouns?
segments.client_message: Oh, um, I go by she/her, if that helps!
